plurals.name: alert_dialog_exit_ecm
plurals.item: Phone will be in Emergency callback mode for %s minutes. Applications using data connection cannot be used while in this mode. Exit now?
Phone will be in emergency callback mode for %s minute. Applications using data connection cannot be used while in this mode. Exit now?

plurals.name: alert_dialog_not_avaialble_in_ecm
plurals.item: Selected action not available in Emergency callback mode. Phone will be in this mode for %s minutes. Exit now?
Selected action not available in Emergency callback mode. Phone will be in this mode for 1 minute. Exit now?
